## Gang.getOtherGangInformation() method

Get information about the other gangs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

<b>Returns:</b>

[GangOtherInfo](./bitburner.gangotherinfo.md)

Object containing territory and power information about all gangs.
